Contributor: Pennell, Joseph, 1857-1926, artist.; E. Ketterlinus & Co., printer.; United States Shipping Board Emergency Fleet Corporation, publisher.;
Note: Signed "Joseph Pennell." Initial "D" with a "P" in it, appears on the bottom right of the illustration. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Illustration shows the sidewise launching of the ship S.S. Lady Janet at the Great Lakes Engineering Co. on July 4th, 1918.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Philadelphia, Pa. : United States Shipping Board Emergency Fleet Corporation,

Title: Launching another victory ship
